

// the test bench and the machine code is below the code
addi x1, x1, 1

addi x2, x2, 2

addi x3, x3, 3

addi x4, x4, 4

addi x5, x5, 5

addi x6, x6, 6

addi x7, x7, 7

addi x8, x8, 8

add x9, x1, x2

add x10, x3, x4

add x11, x5, x6

add x12, x7, x8

addi x13, x13, 1

slli x13, x13, 4

add x14, x13, x0

slli x14, x14, 5

sltiu x15, x2, 5

sltiu x16, x2, 2

sltiu x17, x2, 1

sub x18, x2, x4

slti x19, x18, -5

slti x20, x18, -2

slti x21, x18, -1

addi x22, x22, -32

srli x22, x22, 3

ori x23, x23, -1

xori x24, x24, 5

andi x24, x24, 1

lui x25, -1

add x31, x12, x12

add x31, x31, x2

xor x26, x26, x25

srl x26, x26, x31

or x27, x27, x25

and x28, x25, x11

sub x29, x1, x4

sub x30, x5, x12

hlt


// the machine code of each instruction respectively
